item.title: Envoy Gateway a new Gateway API for Kubernetes
item.description: Envoy Proxy is a well known proxy load balancer offering HTTP, gRPC, TCP, customizable with Lua, Go, WASM … It’s often the core component used to build gateways/proxies for Kubernetes. For example Istio is using it as a proxy load balancer for ingresses but also as a sidecar to create a “mesh network”. Envoy Gateway is a more recent project to manage Envoy proxies inside Kubernetes, it is meant to be a common foundation to build on top of it, but it can be used directly as it is.
